bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Army Medical Board Certificate for Walter Reed, February 8, 1875

div1.p: Reed's Army Medical Board Certificate gives his personal information and includes the names of the Board members. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Army Medical Board Certificate for Walter Reed, February 8, 1875
div1.p:
CERTIFICATE
-OF-
Walter Reed M. D.
Date Febry 8th, 1875

BOARD:
Surgeon Joseph B. Brown
Surgeon John Moore
Surgeon J. H. Bill
Surgeon R. E. Fryer
Asst. Surgeon A. H. Hoff

Name, Walter Reed.
Birthplace, Gloucester County, Virginia.
Residence, Harrisonburg, Virginia.
Age, Twenty-three, (23).
Married or Single, Single.
Graduate of Literary Institution==name of, None.
Univ. of Va. July 1st1869.
Graduate of Medical College,==name of, Bellevue Hospl. Med. Col. Octr 1, 1872
Hospital Service,==Length of Time, Two Years & Six months.
Act. Asst. Surgeon,==Length of service, None.

p.hi: I certify, on honor, that I labor under no mental or physical infirmity,
nor disability of any kind, which can in any way interfere with the most effi-
cient discharge of my duties in any climate.

div1.p:
Walter Reed, M. D.
Date February 8th 1875.
Physical Examination,
